name: Lavender Breeze Heroine
description:
-Phone browser controls: Crosspad for moving and selections. "A-button" for Shooting. "B-button" for Bomb. "Pause-button" for Pause and Resume.

For PC Browsers: full-screen playing recommended, Space key for Pause/Resume.

CREDITS:
-Graphics, Music and Video Game Development by Pinoberry
-Additional Graphics and Scenery by Cuarzo Games.
-Videogame developed with GDevelop game engine.
